channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-21784] Insert overwrite on an acid (not mm) table is ineffective if the input is empty
item.description: The issue of HIVE-18702 is present for ACID tables as well.
item.summary: Insert overwrite on an acid (not mm) table is ineffective if the input is empty

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
